title: A reformed Catholike: or, A declaration shewing how neere we may come to the present Church of Rome in sundrie points of religion: and vvherein we must for euer depart from them with an advertisment to all fauourers of the Romane religion, shewing that the said religion is against the Catholike principles and grounds of the catechisme.
author: Perkins, William, 1558-1602.
publisher: Printed by Iohn Legat, printer to the Vniuersitie of Cambridge,
